dialogues.speaker: IN THE NOTHING...
dialogues.text: AND AT THAT EXACT SAME MOMENT, THE GIRLS’ PHONES DIE. The flashlights disappear and the room goes dark.

dialogues.speaker: HALLIE
dialogues.text: Katie, please!!

dialogues.speaker: WREN
dialogues.text: Let’s go, goddamnit!! The girls grabs Katie’s hands, but she won’t move. It’s l she’s carved in stone. Her body stiff and rigid. THEN A HAUNTING SOUND FILLS THEIR EARS. A BELL, ECHOES OUTSIDE. IT FILTERS THROUGH THE WALLS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The girls freeze. A shiver rolls down their spines.

dialogues.speaker: OFF THE FLOOR
dialogues.text: Wren and Hallie can’t speak. They can’t move, frozen as t watch Katie lift into the air. THEN THOUSANDS OF TINY WHISPERS FILTER OUT OF THE WALLS.

dialogues.speaker: VOICES OF LOST CHILDREN SWIRLING AND CRYING FOR HELP
dialogues.text: Wren and Hallie spin around, but there’s nobody there. On Katie hovering in mid air, drifting towards the ceiling.

dialogues.speaker: KATIE
dialogues.text: HE’S HERE...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 108 Tan Rev. (mm/dd/yy) 117.

dialogues.speaker: THE WALLS LIKE BLACK VEINS SPIDER-WEBBING IN ALL DIRECTIO
dialogues.text: Hallie and Wren’s eyes follow the tentacles up to... AN INKY BLACK TORSO MELTING OUT OF THE CEILING. Hallie and Wren stand frozen, entranced by the terrible figure. Long thin arms forming. Reaching towards Katie as floats upwards. Her body warps and deforms...

dialogues.speaker: AND SHE IS ABSORBED BY THE FIGURE DROPPING DOWN FROM ABOV
dialogues.text: Then a face evolves... STARING AT THEM WITHOUT EYES. A BLANK EMPTY VOID. Wren starts to bolt for the door, but Hallie just stands there. Wren grabs her and spins her around.

dialogues.speaker: WREN
dialogues.text: Hallie!! Run!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The front door slams open. Hallie bursts through the door Wren’s right behind her. As they race into the trees, Hal glances back...

dialogues.speaker: SLITHERING AROUND HIM. HIS BLANK FACE STARING.
dialogues.text: Then Wren takes off!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hallie dodges trees and branches racing after her.

dialogues.speaker: HALLIE
dialogues.text: Wren!! Her feet carry her as fast as they can. THEN WE HEAR SOMETHING BEHIND US!! Hallie looks back... SOMETHING IS MOVING THROUGH THE TREES. A MASSIVE SHAPE. SNAPPING BRANCHES BEHIND HER. Hallie darts through the underbrush. Branches scraping ac her body. Scratching her arms and face. Then out of nowhere, Hallie charges into a clearing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tan Rev. (mm/dd/yy) 118. Hallie turns and sees Wren just as she emerges. They run each other, distancing themselves from the sound of branc breaking. Trees snapping. Up ahead, the moonlight sketches an outline of the horizo The girls see it through the trees.

dialogues.speaker: CRICKETS STOP CHIRPING. THE LEAVES STOP RUSTLING. DEAD QU
dialogues.text: The girls turn toward each other. Then like a whisper...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hair stands on end as the girls recognize the noise. NEXT THAT DEAFENING SILENCE... It’s as if the world were frozen in time...the absence of sound exploding in the girls’ ears. AND THEN A DEEP, LOW TONE. AN UNSETTLING, HOLLOW RING.

dialogues.speaker: THE GIRLS TURN TOWARDS THE SOUND AND SOMEHOW THEY ARE RIG
dialogues.text: BACK AT SLENDER MAN’S MANSION! THE GIANT GNARLED AND TWIS OAK TREE TOWERS OVERHEAD. Arms branching out and winding around each other. A MASSI STATIC SHAPE. Or is there movement? Is it getting closer is the tree changing? Growing? We see the terror on the girls faces as they stare at wha once looked like a sprawling, twisted oak tree. But now really has changed... Morphed into the TALL, SLENDER TORSO OF A MAN with imposs long arms extending towards us. The tree branches CRACK A SNAP LIKE TWIGS as more arms appear.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The girls kick into gear and take off. But now see...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tan Rev. (mm/dd/yy) 119. Slender Man the same exact distance IN FRONT OF THEM! The girls look right. THEY SEE HIM THERE, TOO!

dialogues.speaker: WREN, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: This way! They turn, race towards nothing. Branches slashing at the bodies as they charge through. The girls look for cover. Find it behind a tree. Out of breath. Lungs burning.

dialogues.speaker: HALLIE
dialogues.text: Do you see anything?

dialogues.speaker: WREN
dialogues.text: No...

dialogues.speaker: HALLIE
dialogues.text: C’mon, we gotta keep moving! Hallie starts to go. But Wren stays put.

dialogues.speaker: HALLIE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Wren! Let’s go! Wren turns to Hallie--

dialogues.speaker: WREN
dialogues.text: You go, Hallie... A sudden calm’s come over her.

dialogues.speaker: WREN, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: I can buy you time. Hallie looks at Wren in disbelief.

dialogues.speaker: WREN, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: I screwed up. I never should have shown Lizzie. All of this has been my fault.

dialogues.speaker: WREN, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Run Hallie! Goddamnit!! RUN!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tan Rev. (mm/dd/yy) 120. But somehow Hallie wrestles free and charges deeper into forest. Screaming at the top of her lungs. Too afraid to back. Running for her life. Until...

dialogues.speaker: SMACK
dialogues.text: She crashes into a tree. Or is it him? No time to look. She’s back on her feet. Running the gauntlet. It feels like an eternity. Legs pushed to their limit...

dialogues.speaker: SMACK
dialogues.text: She crashes into another tree... IT’S SLENDER MAN! TOWERING OVER HER! Hallie tries to get back on her feet. Screams--

dialogues.speaker: WHAT DO YOU WANT
dialogues.text: No response. Just that high pitched sound... Hallie falls to the ground as a TENDRIL enters frame, lik some kind of grasping vine made of translucent flesh. The tendril plays around Hallie’s face before, finally, touch her cheek, like a caress. This close, Hallie can recognize that Slender Man’s suit isn’t a suit. His tie isn’t a tie. The “suit” is mottled, fleshy. The tie is just a smear of reddish liquid. Where “face” should be is a roiling mass of some unknown substa Finally, a look of acceptance on Hallie’s face. And then. The world brightens all around us. Shadows disappear as t skies fill with light. Is it the first ray of light as th sun peeks over the horizon? Or something else?

dialogues.speaker: HALLIE GASPS AS A BLINDING LIGHT EXPLODES ALL AROUND HER
dialogues.text: It slowly dissipates and we see the large gnarled oak tre But now it towers over a clearing in the woods. A silent, empty void. An absence... THE MANSION HAS VANISHED INTO NOTHING...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lizzie sits at her computer. Designing a MISSING FLYER wi HALLIE’S PICTURE on it. We can see Lizzie has recovered from her mental episode. she’s definitely worse for wear. And then...

dialogues.speaker: HALLIE, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Lizzie... Lizzie listens, not sure what she heard. She gets up and crosses to her door. Opens it. Peers out. Nobody there... But, just as Lizzie goes to close her door... HALLIE (0.S.) (CONT’D) Lizzie... Lizzie turns. Exits her room to investigate...

dialogues.speaker: LIZZIE
dialogues.text: Hallie? INT. HALLIE’S HOUSE - HALLWAY -- CONTINUOUS 111 Lizzie moves down the hall. Still nobody there.

dialogues.speaker: HALLIE, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Lizzie... She sees the back door open. Heads that way... EXT. HALLIE’S HOUSE -- NIGHT 112 Lizzie enters the backyard. Looks around.

dialogues.speaker: LIZZIE
dialogues.text: Hallie? But nobody is there. Only the forest behind the house. A tear rolls down Lizzie’s cheek as she searches the endl trees. No Hallie. Just tangled branches. We can’t tell wh one ends and another begins... And then we hear something. Unmistakable... A BELL ECHOES IN THE FOREST.  Blue Rev. (06/09/16) 122. And off Lizzie’s SCREAM we...
